item.title: 泰国中央银行行长候选人为自己的独立性辩护
item.description: 泰国银行的两位最终候选人之一为自己辩护，一位前行长指责他由于与一家国营贷款机构的关系而无法做出独立决策。【原文：One of two finalists to run the Bank of Thailand defended himself against accusations by a former governor that he wouldn’t be able to make independent decisions because of his ties to a state-run lender.】

item.title: 新世界寻求在贷款交易后出售中国房地产资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：New World Development Co. is seeking to divest real estate projects in mainland China after pulling off an $11 billion refinancing deal in June, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通称中国打击产能过剩或将提振股市
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Policies in China that are aimed at curbing excess capacity may be positive for equities and global trade if executed right, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 英国要求邮局实施补偿计划，富士通股价暴跌
item.description: 富士通公司股价在东京创下 4 月以来最大跌幅，此前英国公共调查委员会主席要求该公司在 10 月底前公布对邮局丑闻受害者的赔偿计划。【原文：Fujitsu Ltd. shares dropped the most since April in Tokyo after the chair of a UK public inquiry called for the firm to release a compensation plan for victims of the Post Office scandal by the end of October.】

item.title: 亚洲贸易首脑历经 800 小时奔波争取难以实现的美国协议
item.description: 为了与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）达成协议，来自世界各地的贸易谈判代表们一直在不断增加飞往华盛顿的里程数，尤其是亚洲代表团，他们要走的路最远。对大多数人来说，最终协议仍然遥不可及，但他们的行程不会很快放缓。【原文：Trade negotiators from around the world have been racking up miles flying to Washington to strike a deal with President Donald Trump — especially Asian delegations who have the farthest to go. With final agreements still out of reach for most, the travel isn’t slowing down anytime soon.】

item.title: 加州立法者推动要求人工智能公司发布安全政策
item.description: 加州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）去年否决了一项立法，要求大公司为其技术造成的伤害承担责任。【原文：A California lawmaker is making another effort to regulate artificial intelligence in the state after legislation that would have held large companies liable for harm caused by their technology was vetoed last year by Governor Gavin Newsom.】

item.title: 韩国家庭贷款激增令降息计划面临压力
item.description: 在首尔火爆的房地产市场推动下，韩国家庭贷款在 6 月份以 10 个月来最快的速度激增，这使得央行以宽松政策支持经济的努力变得更加复杂。【原文：South Korea’s household lending surged in June at the fastest pace in 10 months, driven by a hot property market in Seoul that’s complicating the central bank’s efforts to support the economy with looser policy.】

item.title: 在新的铜和医药关税之后，印度股市将迎来波动期
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 澳大利亚 "紧急寻求 "有关特朗普药品关税威胁的详细信息
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，澳大利亚正在 "紧急寻求 "有关唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁对进口到美国的药品征收200%关税的更多细节。【原文：Australia is “urgently seeking” more detail on President Donald Trump’s threat to impose 200% tariffs on pharmaceutical imports to the US, Treasurer Jim Chalmers said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 50 岁以上老人村运营商因收费裁决股价下跌
item.description: Lifestyle Communities Ltd. 的股价创下 16 年来最大跌幅，此前澳大利亚一州法庭裁定，该退休村运营商的部分退出费协议应予废除。【原文：Lifestyle Communities Ltd. shares tumbled the most in 16 years after an Australian state tribunal ruled that some of the retirement village operator’s exit fee agreements should be scrapped.】

item.title: 印尼 Chandra Daya 公司斥资 1.46 亿美元首次公开募股，股价跃升 35
item.description: PT Chandra Daya Investasi 公司的股票在雅加达交易的第一天就飙升了 35%，达到了日涨幅限制，人们乐观地认为，该公司将追随与亿万富翁普拉约戈-潘格斯图（Prajogo Pangestu）有关联的其他公司的强劲涨势。【原文：PT Chandra Daya Investasi shares surged as much as 35% in their first day of trading in Jakarta, hitting the daily limit, on optimism they will follow the stellar gains made by other companies linked with billionaire Prajogo Pangestu.】

item.title: 澳航称被盗数据包括乘客地址和用餐选择
item.description: 澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways Ltd.）称，在上周的网络攻击中，570 万客户的个人信息被盗，包括姓名、地址、电话号码和用餐偏好等。【原文：Qantas Airways Ltd. said personal information belonging to 5.7 million customers, ranging from names and addresses to phone numbers and meal preferences, were stolen in last week’s cyberattack, as the fallout from the latest airline security breach becomes clearer.】

item.title: 台湾避开美国关税函后释放谨慎乐观信号
item.description: 台湾在避免收到特朗普政府通知贸易伙伴新关税税率的信函后，表示对与美国的谈判持谨慎乐观态度。【原文：Taiwan indicated it was cautiously optimistic about talks with the US after it avoided getting a letter from the Trump administration notifying trading partners of new tariff rates.】

item.title: 新西兰在通胀和贸易不确定性中维持利率不变
item.description: 新西兰央行维持利率不变，在连续六次降息后暂停，因为通胀加速，但央行表示，如果物价压力减弱，预计将进一步放宽利率。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank left interest rates unchanged, pausing after six straight cuts as inflation quickens, but said it expects to ease them further if price pressures abate.】

item.title: 医院运营商 IHH 将目光投向印度尼西亚和越南进行扩张
item.description: IHH Healthcare Bhd.正将目光投向潜在的新市场印度尼西亚和越南，这家马来西亚医院运营商将继续扩大规模，以抵消该地区不断上涨的医疗成本。【原文：IHH Healthcare Bhd. is looking to potential new markets Indonesia and Vietnam as the Malaysian hospital operator continues building scale to offset rising healthcare costs in the region.】

item.title: 特朗普施压韩国增加国防开支
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，韩国应为自己的国防支付更多费用，并在致函韩国，要求在对其输往美国的货物全面征收 25% 的关税之前延长谈判时间，从而加大了对这个亚洲盟国的压力。【原文：President Donald Trump said South Korea should pay more for its own defense, upping pressure on the Asian ally after sending a letter to extend time for negotiations before 25% across-the-board levies are set to kick in for its shipments to the US.】

item.title: 通货紧缩持续，中国生产者价格创 2023 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 中国生产者价格创下了近两年来的最大降幅，这是因为中国的工厂通货紧缩加深，给消费者价格的小幅改善蒙上了阴影。【原文：China’s producer prices fell the most in nearly two years, as the country’s factory-gate deflation deepens and overshadows a modest improvement in consumer prices.】

item.title: 创业板指中国在经济放缓后加快海上风电项目建设
item.description: 据《全球能源观察》报道，随着中国海上风电行业从 2021 年国家补贴结束后的放缓中复苏，中国已重建了一个庞大的海上风电项目管道。【原文：China has rebuilt a substantial pipeline of offshore wind projects as the sector recovers from a slowdown that followed the end of national subsidies in 2021, according to Global Energy Monitor.】

item.title: ICICI Prudential Asset 申请 12 亿美元印度 IPO
item.description: 印度资产规模第二大的共同基金管理公司 ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co.【原文：ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co., India’s second-largest mutual fund manager by assets, filed preliminary documents for what could be the country’s second-biggest initial public offering this year.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 正在努力删除 Grok 的 "不当 "帖子
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 公司表示，在其人工智能聊天机器人 Grok 分享了多条引起广泛谴责的反犹太主义言论之后，该公司正在努力删除这位亿万富翁的社交网络 X 上的不当帖子。【原文：Elon Musk’s xAI said it is working to remove inappropriate posts on X, the billionaire’s social network, after its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot shared multiple antisemitic comments that drew widespread condemnation.】

item.title: 特朗普计划征收 50%的进口关税，伦敦期铜下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示计划对进口商品征收 50%的关税后，伦敦基准期铜下跌，此举可能会引发全球金属市场的进一步动荡。【原文：Benchmark copper futures fell in London after US President Donald Trump said he planned to implement a 50% tariff on imports, a move that’s likely to spark further upheaval global metal markets.】

item.title: 美国延长谈判缓解贸易担忧，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，8月份开始征收所谓 "对等 "关税的新期限不会推迟，预计各国将利用延长的窗口期继续与美国谈判，此后黄金保持跌势。【原文：Gold held a decline after President Donald Trump said the new August deadline for the start of so-called “reciprocal” tariffs won’t be delayed, with nations expected to use the extended window to continue negotiating with the US.】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存增加，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了美国原油库存膨胀的迹象和唐纳德-特朗普总统关税制度的影响，石油价格趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as traders weighed signs of swelling US crude stockpiles and the fallout from President Donald Trump’s tariff regime.】

item.title: 香港银行借贷上升或预示流动性收紧
item.description: 香港银行的隔夜借款跃升至近五个月来的最高点，这表明为支持本币而采取的一系列干预措施可能正在货币市场上产生预期效果。【原文：Overnight borrowing by Hong Kong banks jumped to the highest in almost five months, a sign that a series of interventions to bolster the local currency may be having a desired effect on the money market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将更新研究战略以支持决策
item.description: 澳大利亚央行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）在储备银行做出维持利率不变的决定令投资者和经济学家震惊一天后表示，澳大利亚央行打算更新其研究战略，以支持决策。【原文：Australia’s central bank intends to refresh its research strategy to support policymaking, Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser said, a day after the Reserve Bank shocked investors and economists with an unchanged interest-rate decision.】

item.title: 伦敦必须摒弃上市 "势利眼 "才能扭转颓势，CBI称
item.description: 英国主要企业游说团体之一的领导人表示，如果英国希望重建伦敦证券交易所日渐式微的地位，就不应再对寻求在伦敦二次上市的公司嗤之以鼻。【原文：The UK should stop looking down on companies seeking a secondary listing in London if it wants to rebuild the stock exchange’s waning status, the leader of one of the country’s main corporate lobby groups said.】

item.title: 法官称英国严重金融犯罪案件面临陪审团审判的厄运
item.description: 在政府下令进行审查，建议在复杂的白领犯罪案件中取消陪审团审判后，英国的刑事司法系统将迎来数十年来最大的一次调整。【原文：The UK criminal justice system is set for its biggest shakeup in decades after a government ordered review recommended getting rid of jury trials in complex white collar crime.】

item.title: 晨星认为，尽管有关税，韩国股票仍是新兴市场的最佳选择
item.description: 晨星财富（Morningstar Wealth）的一位基金经理正在抛售中国和日本股票，以增加对韩国股票的投资。【原文：A fund manager at Morningstar Wealth is selling Chinese and Japanese equities to increase exposure to South Korea, which he’s betting on to provide the best returns in both emerging and Asian markets over the next decade.】

item.title: 市场综述：特朗普加倍强硬，亚洲市场开盘谨慎
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）排除了延长其 8 月关税期限的可能性，华尔街股市盘中表现低迷，亚洲股市开盘低迷。美国总统呼吁对进口商品征收 50%的关税后，美国铜价大涨。【原文：Asia stocks are poised for a subdued open after a lackluster session on Wall Street as Donald Trump ruled out extending his August tariff deadline. US copper prices surged after the president called for a 50% levy on imports.】

item.title: Altice 美国子公司 Lightpath 寻求出售光纤网络 ABS
item.description: Cablevision Lightpath LLC 是一家光纤通信服务提供商，由 Altice USA Inc.【原文：Cablevision Lightpath LLC, a fiber optic communications services provider that is majority controlled by Altice USA Inc., is looking to sell as much as $2.8 billion of asset-backed securities.】
